messages.message:
Hello!

I’m about to merge something into `image-tasks` that will require folks to run it in Docker locally if they want to use Visual Refiner’s checkbox features. Up until now, runlocal was just fine.

The reason is the Dockerfile has some model data that your localhost will not.

If you really want to run outside of Docker for some reason, you could always create the paths to these models on your HD - just ask and I’ll point you to the steps.
and if you can update the run-apple script, that’d be great too, thanks!
also, suuuuper excited for the visual refiner changes!
